div.p: TerVan performed the preparation of molecularly imprinted layer, J.B. carried out the electrophoretic characterization of conjugates, M.T. performed the laser ablation data processing and evaluation, MarVlc carried out the conjugate preparation, V.N. and J.N. were responsible for microscopic conjugate characterization, A.S. carried out the laser ablation optimization, V.K. performed the data analysis, V.A. was responsible for supervision and experimental design, MarVac and TomVac carried out the manuscript preparation.
